conbody.p: We strive to uphold the commitment our parent company, Airbnb, has made to building a community of inclusion and respect. This shared commitment applies to hosts and guests alike, and guarantees the unhindered welcome of guests of all backgrounds. As stated on its website, Airbnb hosts will not discriminate based on race, color, ethnicity, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, or marital status.
